verbose_text: Following the cell fate of hypertrophic chondrocytes by genetic lineage tracing using BACCol10; Cre induced YFP reporter gene expression we show that a progeny of Col10Cre reporter labelled osteoprogenitor cells and osteoblasts appears in the primary spongiosa and participates - depending on the developmental stage - substantially in trabecular, endosteal, and cortical bone formation.
